Articles.Content:
"No officer, I'm not drunk" using knee:

Mo obfgbocfffrt, o'm not fttriumngjbb

My name is Endersmens. I am a resident of the Kerbal Space Program Community. I live on these forums, I breathe these forums, and I enjoy every bit of it. This is the greatest community I've ever seen, and I hope I never leave.

That wasn't bad for eyes closed, now wat it? (seriously. That was with eyes open.)

Typing - I play KSP everyday - with my eyes closed:

I play KSP every day (that was seriously with my eyes closed)

-Hi, How are you-

HI GIW ARE TIY

Meh. I suck at this.

ur ua dybbt giq nicubf ri rgw kwdr ` jwt fucwa auxg ubrwewarubf nwaaFW

It is funny how moving to the left 1 key gives such interesting message

qiqm rgR UA Ekkt xiik, Ur;a KNIAR KUJW awxewr nwaafw,

Wow, that is really cool, it's like a secret language.

"Kerbal Space Program" with my eyes closed:

"kerbal Space Program"

Well, that was uneventful....

With eyes closes and just my right hand:

"Krtvsl dosvr Ptpgrs"

Now, thats better. Actually not so bad - I'm usually just off by one.

Edited August 29, 2015 by Xeldrak

"Kerbal Space Program" with eyes closed... upside down!

Ke5holri rorvt 948y4rj

Dorn, thats harder than I expected

My name is Endersmens. I am a resident of the Kerbal Space Program Community. I live on these forums, I breathe these forums, and I enjoy every bit of it. This is the greatest community I've ever seen, and I hope I never leave.

That wasn't bad for eyes closed, now wat it? (seriously. That was with eyes open.)

---------------------------------------------^ You're only mistake was in the eyes open bit.

----------------------------% you're on;t masitake was in the eues open bit.

Write "something" with your chin. No backspace allowed.

sklmdfgjgb

"spooky scary skeletons" with eyes closed

Doot

Kerval Space Program

Eyes closed.

Write "something" with your chin. No backspace allowed.

sklmdfgjgb

somketyhjikng

I got pretty close. All the letters are there. Just some extra ones.

Alright, type "Kerbal Space Program" with your hands behind your head (your back facing the computer).

glkn.f ,r.mk ,kkynk,b

Oh.

Also, protip, the keyboard is going to be mirrored when you do this.

qwertyuiop[]\asdfghjkl;;'

zxcvbnm,.//

My keyboard w/ eyes closed
\krtbsl \pdsvr \ptoshsmn

yjod od y[omh eoyj 2 lru yp yjr tohjy

This is typing with 1 key to the right

kervsk foace orifeab

eyes closed, one finger

Eyes closed, one finger

kerbsj space prgraj

Eyes closed, typing with right foot

4576ggwwoi AU8WQSF4B P60OTY44QUY

(intended: kerbal space program)

also, somehow I enabled fullscreen mode on Google Chrome. Weird.

Eyes (not) closed, again typing with right foot ( no backspaces )

okerbal ssppace program

Eyes closed, typing: A Kerbal attempted to drive on a space station with eyes closed.
